sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At the Balkans summit in Athens, Greece promises to train Ukrainian pilots to fly F-16s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden vows to rebuild the Hawaiian island of Maui as he surveys the devastation left by the worst wildfires to hit the United States in more than a century.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Thousands of football fans flocked to the streets of Madrid on Monday night to welcome back Spain's Women's World Cup winning team.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis has welcomed European Union and Balkan leaders to a dinner in Athens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The main topic for discussion was the future of the Western Balkan region in the EU, of which many countries are currently members, but which others are hoping to join.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's President Zelensky is also attending, and Mitsotakis has already pledged to keep up military support for Ukraine as long as it takes. Earlier Greece reportedly offered to train Ukrainian pilots to fly the US-made F-16 warplanes, which Denmark and the Netherlands pledged to provide training our pilots on the F-16. Thank you for this proposal and thank you and your team for your willingness to help Ukraine more with the protection of our freedom. days. The Ukrainian leader is shoring up support from allies fearing war fatigue could set in as the conflict appears to have stalled into a war of attrition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's a site becoming all too common in Moscow and its surrounding areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: A street cordoned off and containing the scattered remains of a drone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: With its anti-aircraft defence system, Russia says it shot down two drones in the Moscow region on Thursday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: One of the devices went down near Chatsi, about 20 kilometres west of the capital, and another on the outskirts of nearby Krasnogorsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: According to authorities, there have been no casualties, although there has been some minor damage to buildings and cars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: This is now the fifth consecutive day of drone strikes on Russian territory, with the Kremlin pointing the blame at Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Yevgeny Prigogin has reappeared in Africa. The leader of the Russian mercenary group

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Wagner has released a video in which he suggests he's there to make Russia even greater on all continents and Africa even freer. It's the first time he's appeared on video since his failed rebellion against the Russian army on June the 24th. Prigogine says he continues to hire mercenaries and states Wagner will continue its activities in Africa and Belarus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Following Donald Trump's announcement that he will turn himself in to the authorities on Thursday, news teams gathered by Fulton County Jail in Georgia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The former U.S. president announced it through his social network Truth Social in which he said his trip was not for murder but for making what he described as a perfect call. Trump is accused in Georgia of trying to reverse the results of the 2020 presidential elections. The former president will have to pay a bail of $200,000 to avoid going to jail when he's tried.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The nation grieves with you.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: That's what U.S. President Joe Biden told survivors of Hawaii's wildfires on Monday as he promised to help residents of the island of Maui recover after the deadliest wildfire in the United States in more than a century.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The president and his wife cut short their week-long holiday to comfort survivors of the devastating wildfires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Lahaina was a historic town of 13,000 people and has been virtually destroyed by the flames.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: I saw you fly over and...

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I also want all of you to know the country grieves with you, stands with you, and will do everything possible to help you recover, rebuild, and respect culture and traditions when the rebuilding takes place.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The wildfires have claimed at least 114 lives with 850 people still missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The flames moved so quickly that residents and visitors were caught off guard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Many were trapped in the streets or forced to jump into the ocean to escape.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: It's nearly two weeks since the fire started and Biden has come under attack from Republicans who claim he has not done enough to address the devastation. The White House says Biden delayed his trip so as not to distract officials and rescuers working on the ground.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Firefighters are continuing to tackle a huge wildfire that's devastated forests on the Spanish island of Tenerife for seven days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The blaze has so far ravaged some 13,400 hectares of woodland and more than 12,000 people have been evacuated from their homes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The wildfire area has been declared a catastrophe zone which will allow compensation funds to be released. The fire is in the northeast of the island and not close to any of the main tourist areas.

sentences.sentence: France is reluctantly living under the scourge d'une nouvelle vague de chaleur, la pire jusqu'à présent cette année longue et torride.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Plus de 50 départements sont sous alerte orange, les alertes rouges peuvent être déclarées dans certains endroits.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Les températures n'ont pas baissé de 30 degrés pendant des jours, et beaucoup trouvent les noix inouïes. Ce soir, on ressortira quand ça va se calmer, mais ça ne va pas se calmer aujourd'hui, j'ai l'impression.

Musi być oczywiście ten prosty, konkretny przekaz, ale on nie może w całości zastępować prynat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: A moment of triumph for Spain's Women's World Cup winning side,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: but one that was to be overshadowed by an unsolicited kiss for player Jenny Hermoso from the president of the Spanish Football Association, Luis Rubiales. He's now apologised. between both of us, as well as with others, and where I have probably been wrong, I have to admit it, because in a moment of maximum fusibility, without any bad intention, without any bad faith, well, what happened happened, I think in a very spontaneous way.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The scandal arose after the ceremony following the Women's World Cup final, where Spain had beaten England 1-0.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Afterwards, Hermoso wrote on social media that she didn't like the kiss at all. The Minister of Culture and Sport called Rubiales' behavior unacceptable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Football fans in Spain turned out in their thousands on Monday night to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: celebrate their side winning the Women's World Cup.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The victorious players toured Madrid in an open-topped bus, drinking in the euphoric atmosphere.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Olga Carmona's strike in the 29th minute sealed glory for the Spaniards in Sydney, causing heartbreak for an England side who had been favourites to win.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The Spanish captain joined the celebrations, despite learning after the match that her father had passed away just hours before the final.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The players arrived at the celebration spot near midnight local time, some three hours after their plane had landed. The celebrations ended some four hours later with confetti being sprinkled onto the stage and players and staff and fans singing We Are The Champions.
